summary:
Allows the simple copying of data from one variable to another.
The data copy is conditioned by the control flow which allows to control when the copy is performed.
description:
This block is dynamic thus the input data count can be changed using the block configuration dialog.
The data port handles all value types.

dataPorts.ValueIn1: the input data value to copy.

controlPorts.Out: is activated when the process is completed.
